info.name: Avinash Rao
info.summary: I am a developer and designer. I love to create beautiful websites and applications.

About.title: About Me
About.content:
I'm a passionate and experienced Full Stack Developer with a combined 4 years in the field, I specialize in creating high-quality web applications using a variety of technologies, including JavaScript, C#, TypeScript, React.js, and Node.js. I'm known for my ability to lead successful frontend refactoring projects, collaborate with diverse teams, and provide technical guidance to clients.

In addition to my professional work, I volunteer as a tutor with THINKFUL where I mentor developers and stay updated with the latest industry trends. I hold a Software Engineering certificate from THINKFUL and a Bachelor's in Business Administration with a focus on Healthcare Management from Walden University.

Beyond coding, I enjoy continuous learning, adapting to industry best practices, and contributing to a positive learning environment.

Whether it's crafting innovative software solutions or staying engaged with the tech community, I'm always eager to explore new opportunities and connect with like-minded individuals. Feel free to reach outâ€”I'd love to chat about technology, development, or anything else you find interesting!
